title: Aluminum–air batteries: current advances and promises with future directions
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17628-17663
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02219J, Review Article
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Bharti Rani, Jitendra Kumar Yadav, Priyanka Saini, Anant Prakash Pandey, Ambesh Dixit
Owing to their attractive energy density of about 8.1 kW h kg−1 and specific capacity of about 2.9 A h g−1, aluminum–air (Al–air) batteries have become the focus of research.
